pullrequest.title: Reduce the symbol load caused by feature templates

content.raw: Unit tests on the structs are kind of tricky, since they’re only used during compile-time. The fact that everything is compiling indicates that they’re working as intended. But I’ll try to think through some reasonable unit tests \(which will probably all be compilation tests\).
content.html: Unit tests on the structs are kind of tricky, since they’re only used during compile-time. The fact that everything is compiling indicates that they’re working as intended. But I’ll try to think through some reasonable unit tests (which will probably all be compilation tests).
